alert.note: Alert for Big Island North; Kohala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 23 at 3:36PM HST until February 24 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY FOR KOHALA AND NORTH PORTION OF THE BIG ISLAND... .A strong high pressure system far north of Hawaii will deliver strong trade winds and gusts through Friday, particularly in exposed areas. Stable conditions will allow for intense downsloping gusts in the south Kohala area. ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST FRIDAY... * WHAT...East winds 25 to 35 mph with localized gusts over 50 mph. * WHERE...Portions of the Big Island. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST Friday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can tear off shingles, knock down tree branches, blow away tents and awnings and make it difficult to steer, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Watch out for falling tree branches when walking or driving. Make sure tents and awnings are secure or take them down. Be prepared for power outages.
